change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Typescript reports of mining tonnage giving name of company, where located, mine name, distance to shipping point, character of ore, type of ore, and tonnage for mines in Pima and Santa Cruz Counties, Arizona.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Reports of Tonnage (AZ 090). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript reports of mining tonnage giving name of company, where located, mine name, distance to shipping point, character of ore, type of ore, and tonnage for mines in Pima and Santa Cruz Counties, Arizona.
